# RAG Application with FastAPI and React.js

This project is a RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) application featuring:
- FastAPI backend with Perplexity API integration
- React.js frontend with search and conversational chat interfaces
- Docker Compose setup for self-hosted deployment

## Project Structure
- `backend/`: FastAPI application
- `frontend/`: React.js application
- `docker-compose.yml`: Container orchestration
- `.env`: Environment variables (not committed)

## Development Guidelines
- Follow FastAPI best practices for backend development
- Use modern React patterns and hooks for frontend
- Integrate Perplexity API for both search and RAG functionality
- Maintain clean separation between search and chat features
- Use TypeScript where applicable for better type safety
